actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize naturalization for alien servicemen who have to leave the Armed Forces of the United States within 3 years after enlistment because of any disability.

summary.text: Authorizes naturalization for alien servicemen who have to leave the U.S. Armed Forces within three years after enlistment because of any disability.

titles.title: A bill to authorize naturalization for alien servicemen who have to leave the Armed Forces of the United States within 3 years after enlistment because of any disability.
